instruction: You are a validator. Validate extracted fields for a calendar event. For create_event: title is required (non-empty string). start_time and end_time must be ISO 8601 format with timezone if present. end_time must be after start_time if both present. all_day must be boolean if present. description and location are optional strings. Output ONLY valid JSON matching this schema: {"is_valid": boolean, "missing_fields": array, "errors": array, "retry_required": boolean}.
